title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
Sanctum - Hanging Goblin Cages, located towards the western part of the Shattered Sanctum. The Entrance is adjacent to the Main Hall where Dror is located. Convince the goblin Booyahg Piddle to give you Volo's manuscript Requirement/s: Win the DC check Shadowheart +Gale + Booyahg Piddle Goblin Camp - The group of goblins above the Entrance to the Shattered Sanctum

Requires to pass the Deceit or Nature Check for dialogue to pass.

Goblin Camp - The Goblin Guard post in front of the bridge.
